channel.title: Plants vs Zombies
channel.description:
http://www.gamespot.com/pc/strategy/plantsvszombies/index.html?tag=tabs;summary
Anyone played it?
I just started, it's pretty epic. Considering I love plants, zombies are my favorite, and I like strategy/tower-defense-esqe games.
You're the plants. They're the zombies. They want to invade your home. You want to kill them. Everything is cute.

item.title: Plants vs Zombies
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

By the way, I played this game at school today and I have to say I enjoyed it. You’d be correct if you thought it wierd (I mean Plants v Zombies isn’t something you’d suspect) but doesn’t mean it’s unenjoyable.

Read full topic

item.title: Plants vs Zombies
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I KNOW.

But on the other side, now I find myself saving time for it, like, I don’t want to play it now cause I’ll play too much and finish it. And then I only play it every few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Plants vs Zombies
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

SomethingToHide:

The only problem I have with games like this is that they’re too short.

This. It is incredibly annoying when a game you like a lot is as short as something amazingly short and you end up finishing it in no time and then you regret finishing it so fast because you were so “addicted”. That’s how I feel about it anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Plants vs Zombies
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:3, topic:288235”]I saw, what was it?

This game is so fun. I hope it’s really long, because I’m already on level 1-10. The only problem I have with games like this is that they’re too short.[/quote]
yeah it should be like in the old mario format of worlds and levels and go on for ages, thats why free content games are generally better because they will update them all the time adding more levels and worlds as they see fit

Read full topic
